verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You stood before creation
eternity in Your hand
You spoke the earth into motion
My soul now to stand

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Youstood before my failure
And carried cross for my shame
My sin weighed upon Your shoulders
My soul now to stand

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So what can I say
And what can I do
But offer this heart O God
Comletely to You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
So I'll walk upon salvation
Your Spirit alive in me
This life to declare Your promise
My soul now to stand

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
So I'll stand
With arms high and heart abandoned
In awe of the One who gave it all
I'll stand
My soul Lord to You surrendered
All I am is Yours

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
So what can I say
And what can I do
But offer this heart O God
Completely to You
